extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected BIG-IP Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine the installed version of BIG-IP to assess if it is vulnerable.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the BIG-IP version 14.1.0 or later?
Is updating to the latest version possible?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest BIG-IP Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update BIG-IP to the latest version and apply the corresponding hotfix to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Block Configuration Utility Access
extracted_playbook.description: Implement workarounds by blocking Configuration utility access through self IP addresses and the management interface.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply F5 Mitigation Script
extracted_playbook.description: Run the provided shell script to adjust configuration files on BIG-IP versions 14.1.0 and later.

extracted_playbook.title: Block Configuration Utility Access via Self IP
extracted_playbook.description: Block access to the Configuration utility through self IP addresses as a temporary workaround.

extracted_playbook.title: Block Configuration Utility Access via Management Interface
extracted_playbook.description: Block access to the Configuration utility through the management interface as a temporary workaround.
